items.title: CAS Lernende fördern und coachen
items.description: Vocational training managers encourage, accompany and support the learners so that they can (further) develop.

items.title: Business Information Technology
items.description: Bachelor's Degree Business Information Technology with Specialization in Data Science

strengths.title: Strengths
strengths.description: Through Gallup's CliftonStrengths Finder, I have analyzed my individual talents and use them in a targeted way to make the most of my natural strengths.

items.title: Coffee
items.summary: Every Friday, I volunteer at the 'S Kafi im Stall' café in Steinmaur. Even though I don't drink coffee myself, I enjoy serving the guests and treating them with appreciation.

items.title: Sports
items.summary: I like to do sport with friends and enjoy being active and the company. When I go jogging alone, I try to enjoy the beautiful view and not be too obsessive.

items.title: Reading
items.summary: Books open up new perspectives on familiar things, but I can also simply switch off in stories without thinking too much.

items.title: Baking
items.summary: I like to watch cooking videos to see how professionals cook. Afterwards, I like to try out recipes and proudly enjoy my creations.

contact.title: Contact
contact.messageReceived: I'll get back to you as soon as possible.

about.summary: This portfolio is created with Fresh and Deno and tries to give an insight about me.
